entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
